Package ORM

Class Manager

java.lang.Object
ORM.Manager
public final class Manager
extends java.lang.Object

static Manager class

The Manager class operates as a single Instance for legal checks and other operational tests

  • Method Details

    • getEntity

      public static Entity getEntity​(java.lang.Object obj)

      Method getEntity

      Searches for already created class entity. If nothing found, creates new entry in Entities hashMap.
      Parameters:
      obj - the Object which class (or itself if object is a class already) will be checked for an existing entry in Entities hashMap.
      Returns:
      An entity of the input object.

    • insertCache

      private static void insertCache​(java.lang.Object object)

    • getEntityIfExists

      public static Entity getEntityIfExists​(java.lang.Class<?> type)

      Method getIfCached

      Checks if an entity of a certain class is stored in the Entities hashMap.
      Parameters:
      type - the class which will be searched for.
      Returns:
      An existing entity or null if no entity found.

    • tableExists

      private static boolean tableExists​(java.lang.String tableName) throws java.sql.SQLException
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException

    • get

      public static <T> T get​(java.lang.Class<T> type, java.lang.Object... pks)

      Method get

      Alternative to having to cast the generic object to a certain class. Made into an extra method because of unchecked cast warning so it is up to the user which implementation they want to use.
      Type Parameters:
      T - generic wildcard
      Parameters:
      type - the class, the object will be cast to
      pks - the primary key(s) as object(s)
      Returns:
      a object cast to the wildcard class

    • getObject

      public static java.lang.Object getObject​(java.lang.Class<?> type, java.lang.Object... pks)

      Method getObject

      Either finds the object in one of the caches or calls the create function below the make a new one.
      Parameters:
      type - the class of the wanted object
      pks - the identifier primary key(s) object(s)
      Returns:
      the object either from the cache or from the database.

    • createObject

      public static java.lang.Object createObject​(java.lang.Class<?> type, java.lang.Object... pks)

      Method createObject

      Will be called if object is not cached already. Creates a new SelectQuery with the given arguments. Makes a database call and inserts the returning values into a new object of the input class.
      Parameters:
      type - the class of which a new object will be created.
      pks - the identifier primary key(s) object(s) from which the database select query will be constructed.
      Returns:
      A new object of type.Class with the stored database call values.

    • createObject

      private static <T> T createObject​(java.sql.ResultSet res, java.lang.Class<T> type) throws java.sql.SQLException, java.lang.IllegalAccessException, java.lang.NoSuchMethodException, java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException, java.lang.InstantiationException

      Wildcard Method createObject

      Taken out of other createObject method for visibility.
      Type Parameters:
      T - wildcard class type
      Parameters:
      res - Database call ResultSet
      type - class for new object
      Returns:
      new object of type.Class with inserted values from ResultSet
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if anything went wrong with either the connection or the ResultSet
      java.lang.IllegalAccessException - if reflection field access is not set to true
      java.lang.NoSuchMethodException - if certain method is not found within the class
      java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException - if getting a new object from type fails
      java.lang.InstantiationException - if instancing a new object from type fails

    • setFieldValue

      private static <T> void setFieldValue​(java.sql.ResultSet res, T t, Field field) throws java.sql.SQLException

      Method setFieldValue

      Function needed in two different places of T createObject methods so it got extracted to own method.
      Type Parameters:
      T - to generify method.
      Parameters:
      res - the ResultSet from getObject.
      t - wildcard.
      field - Field where a new value will be set.
      Throws:
      java.sql.SQLException - if ResultSet does not contain value of object with field column name.

    • createTable

      public static void createTable​(java.lang.Object object)

      Method createTable

      can be used to create a new table in the database from a certain object.
      Parameters:
      object - the object from which fields a createTable query will be created and executed.

    • save

      public static void save​(java.lang.Object object)

      Method save

      Insert query. Inserts a new object into the database
      Parameters:
      object - the object of which it's data will be inserted into the database.

    • saveOrUpdate

      public static void saveOrUpdate​(java.lang.Object object)

      Method saveOrUpdate

      Upsert query Inserts a new object into the database or updates a database entry if already in database
      Parameters:
      object - the object of which it's data will be upserted in the database.

    • addSuperClassTargets

      private static void addSuperClassTargets​(SelectQuery select, java.util.List<java.lang.String> targets, Entity entity)

      Inner Method addSuperClassTargets

      Helper Method for parent class variable fetching. Calls parent class entities recursively and adds their inner fields to target list.
      Parameters:
      select - the current selectQuery
      targets - the selectQuery target field list
      entity - the current Entity
